title: Rank wont show in my profile
body:
Hey there everyone,

i just played a few games of juicy rankeds (2 games without anyone flame on my team, no afk'ing but great teamefforts = 2 wins). Due to my habbit of not looking LP gains/losses in the postgame-lobby, i was curious how my standing was. But looking up my profile shows me, that i'm in my placement games... My League-Header only shows me the infos about all possible ranks i could place in and that i have to paly ranked for this.

If i look up the profile of a friend, i dont see anything. According to this, my B5-Duomate is Silver V, 0 LP without knowing (hooray).

So... is ranked-season over now or is it just a bug?

replies.body: Are you referring to your profile inside the client?  This may be a visual issue with the client, if you are seeing incorrect ranks for yourself and friends.  I recommend bringing this up in the [bug report boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)a long with any screenshots so our bug team can take a look.  Thanks for letting us know!
